command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.delegations" options="delegated-services" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.ipamPoolPrefixAllocations" options="ipam-pool-prefix-allocations ipam-allocations" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies" options="policies" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.contextualServiceEndpointPolicies" options="contextual-service-endpoint-policies" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions" options="service-endpoint-policy-definitions" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions[].properties.serviceResources" options="service-resources" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.serviceEndpoints" options="endpoints" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.serviceEndpoints[].locations" options="locations">

<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules" options="security-rules" hide="True" group="NetworkSecurityGroup">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationAddressPrefixes" options="destination-address-prefixes" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@ApplicationSecurityGroup_create>" var="$subnetParameters.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationApplicationSecurityGroups" options="destination-application-security-groups" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationPortRanges" options="destination-port-ranges" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourceAddressPrefixes" options="source-address-prefixes" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourceApplicationSecurityGroups" options="source-application-security-groups" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourcePortRanges" options="source-port-ranges" group="Properties">

<arg type="array" var="$subnetParameters.properties.applicationGatewayIPConfigurations" options="application-gateway-ip-configurations" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@SubResource_create>" var="$subnetParameters.properties.ipAllocations" options="ip-allocations" hide="True" group="Properties">
